attributes.action: Tell us what shops did with the weaker free bags when they brought in 5p bags.
attributes.background: Recently the government forced supermarkets to charge British shoppers 5p  to use plastic bags. The shops brought in new stronger bags overnight when the charge became enforceable and I demand to know what happened to the weaker free bags.

rejection.details: Decisions about what to do with carrier bags would be a matter for the shops involved, not for the Government or Parliament.
